text: The 2006 Missouri Valley Conference men's soccer season was the 16th season of men's varsity soccer in the conference. The 2006 Missouri Valley Conference Men's Soccer Tournament was hosted by Bradley and won by Creighton. == Teams == == MVC Tournament == == See also == * Missouri Valley Conference * Missouri Valley Conference men's soccer tournament * 2006 NCAA Division I men's soccer season * 2006 in American soccer == References == Category:Missouri Valley Conference Category:2006 NCAA Division I men's soccer season
title: 2006 Missouri Valley Conference men's soccer season
